attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For single mothers and fathers who are forced to provide excess monetary funds for what most people would think are normal things... I.E. school uniforms, food, clothing, recreation.. when the government with all its 'wisdom' seems to allow imports in to the country and provides them with everything!! Drop council tax for original U.K residents .

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
